text: Mazzy Star is an alternative music group popular for their songs "Fade Into You" and "Into Dust". "Into Dust" was played on an episode of the TV drama The O.C.. In 2013 Mazzy Star released Seasons of Your Day, their first album since 1996. The album got good reviews. ==Discography== * She Hangs Brightly (1990) * So Tonight That I Might See (1993) * Among My Swan (1996) * Seasons of Your Day (2013) == References == Category:Musical groups from California Category:People from Santa Monica, California Category:1988 establishments in California Category:Musical groups established in 1988
title: Mazzy Star
